articles.title: European rocket Vega crashes after initial launch - Sky News Australia
articles.description:
European Rocket Vega carrying two satellites has crashed landed in the Atlantic Ocean- marking it the third failure in eight launches. 

European Space Agency has been under pressure to develop a reliable rocket to move away from its dependency on Russian roc…

articles.title: Europe's Vega rocket crashes back to Earth - BBC
articles.description: Europe's premier small rocket fails in flight again - the third time in eight outings.
articles.content:
Europe's premier small rocket has failed in flight once again.
The Vega vehicle was lost 2.5 minutes into its latest mission from the Kourou spaceport in French Guiana.
It was carrying two French-b… [+3952 chars]

articles.description: The spread of bird flu has accelerated in the past weeks in France, the European Union's second largest poultry producer, the farm ministry said on Wednesday, raising concern of further shortages....
